    • toggleStaffMode

      void toggleStaffMode(boolean silentJoin)
      Toggle the staff mode.
      Parameters:
      silentJoin - if true, the inventory will be saved and the player will enter silently.

    • setStaffChatAsDefault

      void setStaffChatAsDefault(boolean staffChatAsDefault, boolean saveInDB)
      Set the player's staff chat mode.
      Parameters:
      staffChatAsDefault - if true, the player will be in staff chat mode by default
      saveInDB - if true, the player's staff chat mode will be saved
